DOC.detailed_description: Incidence Ovarian Cancer Ovarian cancer first mortality rate gynecologic malignancy ( 1-3 ) become important disease recent year ( 4-6 ) . Thus , identification new biologic factor predictive individual disease course prognosis would extremely useful . DOC.criteria: Patients ovarian carcinoma undergo hysterectomy , bilateral salpingooophorectomy , omentectomy , appendectomy enrol clinical data obtain hospital . All patient receive four six course adjuvant platinumcontaining chemotherapy.Histologic grade accord International Union Cancer criterion ( 28 ) . The stage disease classify accord International Federation Gynecology Obstetrics ( FIGO , 1987 ) . Pelvic paraaortic lymph node sampling perform , disease confine within ovary without ruptured capsule . The histopathologic data , include histologic type histologic grade , evaluate certified pathologist . The maximal diameter residual tumor surgery also record . All patient follow 3month interval .
